title: 214 For 2014 (Part I)
body:
These artists have shaped much of my new music listening over the past year or so.

Here’s hoping that they’ll continue to do the same in 2014.

Some signed, some unsigned. Some recording in plush studios with the most highly sought after producers in the world, some recording in their bedrooms. Some have been around for several years, some have been around for several weeks.

These aren’t predictions, these are hopes.

Here’s to 2014. (Spotify playlist to come)

**[I](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/25377-214-2014-part/) /// [II](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/25382-214-2014-part-ii/) /// [III](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/25384-214-2014/) /// [IV](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/25389-214-2014-part-iv/) /// [V](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/25392-214-2014-part-v/)**
